alert.note: Alert for Barton (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 3:31AM CDT until April 05 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 AM CDT FOR BARTON COUNTY... At 331 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lamar, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Prairie State Park, Lamar, Golden City, Liberal, Nashville, Lamar Heights, Irwin, Milford, Oakton, Iantha, Verdella, Kenoma, Hannon and Boston. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 59 and 76. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
